description: Crystal Project is a mix of old school job based jRPG mixed with a ton of 3D platforming and exploration.

CrystalProject-v0.10.0r2.description:
**Hotfixes:**
If you encounter:
 - Generation crash on no job rando: Redownload this release's apworld
 - Crash that starts with "Unknown rule in locations.json logic.regionsanity.value == logic.options.regionsanity.option_disabled": Redownload and run this release's installer

**Crystal Project AP World v. 0.10 is out!** :tada: 
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

Find a Bug? Have a Suggestion?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

New Features
- GM Chauffeur: Regionsanity teleports you to the starting region
- Regionsanity 🔥EXTREME🔥: Option that will forcibly teleport you out of passless regions! 3 bonus YAMLs for you to try it with the new region refactor~ you'll love them~ :)
- Prefilled Maps: Option to autofill region maps if you have their map items

Upgrades
- Dunk Pranked: Splashier dunk tank trap! Enjoy~
- Gone Fishin': Fisher locations added
- Shopsanity: Shops hint when you close the shop window and don't crash!
- Region Refactor:
  - Logic is now way more flexible for possible expected routes!
  - Revamped over 20 regions! Notably: Jidamba Tangle and Tall, Tall Heights (why does Tall Tall connect to so many regions..?)
  - Goodbyebek Cave

Downgrades
- Less Mobile Mollusc: That octopus has outswum you for the last time

Backend Improvements
- ✨ File Structure Organization ✨

Bug Fixes
- Matching a region's expected level precisely no longer shows as inaccessible (oops)
- Logic now understands the Skeleton Key can be used to unlock Eaclaneya
- Autospend LP option should now work with randomized abilities
- Regionsanity:
  - Disconnecting in a region you don't have the pass for no longer has the chance to trap you in infinite inescapable dialogue boxes! ^_^;;;;;;
  - Shops now correctly display as out of logic if you have no way to earn money
  - Checks requiring rental salmon now require the Salmon River Pass
  - Removed possible seed brick from True Astley goal
- Use Mods:
  - Modded items in regions with keys (i.e. Capital Jail) will require all keys
  - Modded checks asking for jobs will require said jobs now

KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- Mods newer than Editor version 30 are incompatible
- Crash when exiting the Lost & Found shop (and possibly the Recipe shops)
- Extreme Regionsanity: the logic will incorrectly expect you to get to checks on Delende Peak with no mounts and no Seaside Cliffs Pass


Full refactored Region list: Delende, Soiled Den, Proving Meadows, Jojo Sewers, Boomer Society, Capital Jail, Capital Pipeline, Salmon Pass, Salmon River, Ancient Reservoir, Salmon Bay, The Open Sea, **Tall, Tall Heights**, Northern Cave, Land's End, Slip Glide Ride, Northern Stretch, Castle Ramparts, The Chalice of Tar, **Jidamba Tangle**, Jade Cavern, Continental Tram, and Ancient Labyrinth
CrystalProject-v0.10.0r2.title: Crystal Project Version 0.10.0

CrystalProject-v0.11.0.description:
**Crystal Project AP World v. 0.11 is out!** :tada: 
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

Find a Bug? Have a Suggestion?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

🚨 This release will break if you use old YAMLs 🚨

New Features
- Mighty Mod Menu: The Archipelago button in the menu now contains the Connect menu, the Locations menu, shop menus for consumables and starter gear (Regionsanity only), and the button for:
- Disable Sparks: New player option that creates an Enable/Disable Sparks toggle in the in-game Archipelago menu and disables enemy sparks! Laugh at their fruitless attempts to battle you! (At least until you deign to re-enable them for experience or money.) And then disable them once more to adventure unbothered!
- Archipelago Stone: New starting item for Regionsanity that you can use to teleport to your starting location whenever you want
- Earn Your Info: New Item Info Mode choice that hides the usefulness of checks on the map until you complete 50% of your game
- Locations? Grouped: Added location groups for Crystals, Bosses, Shops, and Region Completions, which can be used to 1) exclude them from having good items or 2) as priority locations, like:
- Crystals? Prioritized: New player option to preferentially pick crystals as locations for progression items
- Everywhere a Sign: Penguin Keeper and the Sky Arena now have signs next to them listing the items they have (unless you haven't Earned That Info yet! ^_^)

Upgrades
- Region Refactor: Even more regions revamped! Notably, Delende, Poko Poko Desert, and Rolling Quintar Fields
- ✨ Item Classification ✨ : Progression items have gained additional tags to help game balance! Like Deprioritized for collectibles that only give one check, Deprioritized & Skipbalancing for victory McGuffins, and Useful for those super clutch items like mount instruments
- Handy Dandy Nan: The opening narration will display a random tip to let you know about cool features in our mod! B)
- Meaningful Multichecks: All locations with multiple checks like the Salmon Race will now use their most important accessible item for the map icon they display
- Convenient Connect: If a number is already in the port box, pasting a new number into the port box will now replace the old one instead of appending

Backend Improvements
- Mod version checker is less strict so we can release smaller updates without breaking things! And without having multiple versions of the same version number ^_^;; This change is for everyone, but especially for ploki 💝
- Options are in the correct case for Python (this is what will break old YAMLs)
- Faster connection with Use Mods if the correct mods are already enabled

Bug Fixes
- Vanilla starting jobs should not reappear after a disconnect!!! They better not!!!!! 🗞️
- Universal Tracker doesn't crash
- Exiting the Lost & Found shop doesn't crash
- Denying the Mañana Man his clams doesn't crash (but... how could you...)
- Using the Locations menu hotkey now actually pauses the game
- Fixed a couple connect menu bugs
- Added rule to Sara Sara innkeeper to make sure you can earn money because he charges for the room
- Luxury shops don't mistakenly have their full stock with only one Luxury Pass, and they no longer hint for items you can't see yet
- Pressing the escape key doesn't trap you in a menu loop (thanks for finding this, Metallical! 🙌)
- Regions now display the correct expected level because they actually take level compared to enemies into account in the UI
- Ignoring a shop that also has a regular check on it will no longer incorrectly display a shop icon for the regular check
- Fishing tackle (now used for Fishermen checks) removed from shops
- Chloe in Jidamba can no longer become a sparkle
- True Astley:
  - No longer adding twice the number of STEM WARDs and Deity Eyes as necessary
  - Fixed generation failures caused by incorrect indirect connection checking (thanks, Mysteryem, qwint, and Ishigh! 🙌)
- Regionsanity:
  - Region access requirement added to all goal locations (oops)
  - Region completion locations correctly check whether you can reach all locations required for them
  - Multiple logic fixes for Regionsanity Extreme
  - The grey area warning will no longer be stuck on the screen the whole time you're in the Over/Underpass
  - Regions with zero locations (like the Neptune Shrine with Shopsanity off) will no longer have Region Completion locations that complete instantly at the start of the seed
  - The Old World gets a Region Completion location if Kill Bosses is on with Included Regions set to all
- Shopsanity: no longer expects you to be able to earn money in the Quintar Reserve and Capital Sequoia without being appropriately leveled
- Use Mods:
  - If you don't have all the mods that were used in generating a seed installed and try to connect, a helpful error message will appear instead of crashing
  - Ensures correct mods are applied in the correct order, even if that number is zero
  - New World Stone Job Quantity will now be calculated correctly if you had Use Mods on and Job Rando off
  - New World Stone Job Quantity will now be calculated correctly if you have Use Mods off, Job Rando on, and mods in your Crystal Project mods folder
  - No longer gives a Key Error with Job Rando off if a mod has edited a crystal; will add that job to the pool instead and have a message in the generation log

KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- Mods newer than Editor version 30 are incompatible... for now ;)


Regions touched in the latest rework: **Poko Poko Desert**, Eastern Chasm, Dione Shrine, Quintar Reserve, Chalice of Tar, Salmon River, Salmon Bay, Lake Delende, Land's End, Yamagawa M.A., The Open Sea, Sara Sara Bazaar, Continental Tram, **Delende**, Seaside Cliffs, Capital Sequoia, Mercury Shrine, Proving Meadows, Greenshire Reprise, Cobblestone Crag, **Rolling Quintar Fields**, Quintar Sanctum
CrystalProject-v0.11.0.title: Crystal Project Version 0.11.0

CrystalProject-v0.11.1.description:
**Crystal Project Hotfix v. 0.11.1**
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

✅ Compatible with existing v. 0.11.0 worlds ✅

Receiving a trap while disconnected no longer crashes the game.
CrystalProject-v0.11.1.title: Crystal Project Hotfix Version 0.11.1

CrystalProject-v0.11.2.description:
**Crystal Project Hotfix v. 0.11.2**
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

✅ Compatible with existing v. 0.11.0 - v 0.11.99 worlds ✅

- Received traps will not activate until after cutscene.  It's still possible to get teleported while NPCs are talking to you if it's not a cutscene, we're working on it.
- Shops should no longer attempt to hint for an item you bought very recently.
- Hints received should no longer crash even if you're very very fast at using shops.
- Jobs received before you connect for the first time are no longer unusable AND they're also now selectable at character select.
- Pressing the Locations hotkey when you're viewing the contents of a region will now close the menu.  It already did this for viewing the regions list, but now it also does it when viewing a single region.
CrystalProject-v0.11.2.title: Crystal Project Hotfix Version 0.11.2

CrystalProject-v0.11.3.description:
**Crystal Project Hotfix v. 0.11.3**
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

✅ Compatible with existing v. 0.11.0 - v 0.11.99 worlds ✅

- Fixed crash when changing to a job received before starting the game
- Progressive levels on Set or Catch-up now only take effect after you finish character select, giving the levels and LP to the correct jobs
- Receiving multiple progressive levels at once will now only send you one message
- Receiving a Teleport/Dunk Tank Trap while in a boss fight that doesn't chain IMMEDIATELY into a cutscene will no longer yoink you out before the cutscene starts (sure was a shame when people did True Astley and then couldn't finish the game because they got dunked in the Chalice of Tar!)
CrystalProject-v0.11.3.title: Crystal Project Hotfix Version 0.11.3

CrystalProject-v0.11.4.description:
**Crystal Project Hotfix v. 0.11.4**
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

🚨 AP World Update 🚨
✅ Compatible with existing v. 0.11.0 - v 0.11.99 mod versions and existing YAMLs ✅

Correction to Level Gating rule on shops in Shopsanity.
CrystalProject-v0.11.4.title: Crystal Project Hotfix Version 0.11.4

CrystalProject-v0.12.0.description:
### **Crystal Project AP World v. 0.12 is out!** :tada:
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

### Find a Bug? Have a Suggestion?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

### Big thanks to everyone who had suggestions, requests, or reported bugs! We've made a lot of improvements thanks to you. 💝
### This update's a whopper!

### New Features
- Home Point Hustle: Add every save point as a location!
  - Hustle Only: Can ONLY teleport to a save point if you've found its matching teleport item (touching does not unlock warp!)
  - Mixed: Can teleport to a save point either if you've touched it or if you've found its matching teleport item.
- Passive Point Party: Change the number of Passive Points you start with and/or set a maximum number to unlock with Passive Point Boost items!
- Hop To It: Increase the level of platforming skill you're expected to use to get checks! (Only a handful of these are in so far; please feel free to suggest more places where you can commit platforming crimes to be added to these rules!)
  - Fancy Footwork: Above-average jumping skill expected.
  - One Hop Beyond: More jumping tricks expected, like ibek jumping up from underneath an overhang.
  - Pray: Who needs the Golden Quintar in The Sequoia? Not you!
- Improved Item Info: The Locations list now displays an icon for each location so you can tell what type of item is hiding there (as long as you haven't picked Item Info: Obscured, or if you've earned it in Item Info: Earned!)
- Save Slot Labels: Your Archipelago slot name and port number are now displayed in your in-game save slots! Now you don't have to wonder which save goes with which multiworld.
- Free Me: Added a button to release all your items in the Goal menu in-game.
- Personal Growth: Added the Growth Change menu to the in-game Archipelago menu; no need for a trip to Capital Sequoia to adjust your stats!

### Upgrades
- Starting Level: Players can now set their starting level in the YAML, completely separate from Progressive Level Size!
- New Keep Construction: For the Astley & True Astley goal, the New World Stone is now in the items pool instead of being sent when you get enough jobs. Now, there is a mysterious wall blocking your path to the final fight that will only disappear when you have collected enough Jobs!
- Regionsanity:
  - The World Your Oyster: Starter regions can now be ANY region with enough available checks to start!
  - Fishy Friend: If your starter region is The Open Sea, The Deep Sea, or The Depths (haha enjoy that), you start with a Salmon Violin.
  - Starter Region Levels: Players can now pick what level range they want their random starter region to be in! (Note: if the game picks a higher level region than you set for your Starting Level, you will be leveled up appropriately; otherwise, you'll start at whatever Starting Level you set.)
  - A Fresh Start: Changed starting points in several regions to be more interesting/have more locations immediately available: The Sequoia, The Chalice of Tar, Jidamba Eaclaneya, Beaurior Rock, and The Deep Sea
  - Animated Entry: When entering a region that you have the Region Pass for, a pass icon will appear along with the name of the region. It's very cute!
  - Hit the Ground Running: Teleports you instantly to your starter region instead of the slow fall to Spawning Meadows.
- More Mod Compatible: Mods newer than editor version 30 are now compatible with our version of the game! I.e., any mod that's compatible with the current version of Crystal Project in the main branch is now compatible with our Archipelago mod of the game! :tada:
- Region Rework Continues: Even more regions revamped! Notably, Cobblestone Crag, Greenshire Reprise, Sara Sara Beach **(no longer split into East and West!)**, Salmon Bay, Shoudu Province (hissssss), Undercity, Beaurior Volcano, Beaurior Rock, Quintar Reserve, Slip Glide Ride, The Chalice of Tar, Flyer's Crag, and Jidamba Eaclaneya
- Locations? Even More Grouped: Added location groups for each region, each subregion (like Sky Arena), Purple Chests, Ore Nodes, End-Game Bosses, Secret Herbs, Black Squirrels, Dog Bones, Clamshells, and Quintar Sheddings, Mount Instruments, Bribe Quests, Challenge Quests, Fetch Quests, Collectible Turn-Ins, Fishers, Gifts, Luxury Pass Required, Job Checkers, and Salmon Race Prizes
- More Legible Maps: When hovering a location on the world map, the name will now be displayed on two lines instead of one, so my very long location names can still be read easily! ^_^;;
- Speedier Navigation: Using the left or right bumper to scroll the Regions list will now jump twice as far up or down the list.
- Handy Generation Notes: Generation output will now have a message with your starter region and level.
- Beepier Boops: Autojump toggle will now make a different sound effect when you turn it on vs when you turn it off.
- Thanks For That: Messages about items you've received will now tell you who sent it to you. So you can thank them for that Crag Demon Trap. :D
- **Explorer YAML updated with new settings!**

### Downgrades
- Async Lifesaver: No more drowning in messages (probably)! When you connect, messages will only display for items you received while offline if they are progression. And if multiple Progressive Levels have been received, only one summary message will display!
- One At a Time: Progressive Level Size's minimum has been reduced to 1.
- Little a Clam As a Treat: Clamshells goal minimum has been reduced to 1.

### Bug Fixes
 - Fixed crash on evaluating accessible but out of logic regions.
 - Fixed Enable Sparks button not working if Regionsanity was off.
 - Fixed laggy world map.
 - Fixed level gating calculations!! Again!!!!
 - No longer expects player to be able to earn money in subregions without combat in regions where other subregions have combat.
 - No longer breaks if non-.json files are in the player's mod folder (including zipped-up packages of mods).
 - Fixed another east/weast location name mistake in Jidamba Tangle (thanks Corence!)
 - Game no longer thinks Golden Quintar is a salmon (thanks Sterlia!)
 - Removed incorrect connection from Salmon River -> Salmon Bay (thanks Zeno!)
 - Removed incorrect connection between Proving Meadows and The Pale Grotto (thanks Azuri and Woli!)
 - Ibek Bell and Sky Arena locations that require Arachlea are now removed if Kill Bosses is off (thanks PyroGnome!)
 - Fixed broken passive trees when using class ability rando.
 - Fixed LP rollover being inconsistent sometimes with scholar and summoner. It also plays well now with summoner and scholar abilities if they are randomized into the pool.
 - Level ups no longer happening before class selection for sure this time!!!
 - Fixed incorrect icon for Awl Drum.
 - Fixed Tangle sparks aggroing on you like they're bosses when they only have a chance to be Rexosaur. Those posers.
 - Regionsanity:
    - Region Completion message pop-ups should now always come after the message for the item you just found to complete the region.
    - Fixed some connections not getting re-checked for whether they're in logic in non-Extreme.
    - Fixed code that checked if a region was accessible but out of logic (yellow in the Regions list) to check the actual region and not a subregion.
    - Lost Son check is now out of logic without both the Sara Sara Bazaar Pass and Poko Poko Desert Pass.
    - If a player has a Region Pass in their starting inventory that is not in their included regions, generation will fail with a useful error message to prevent picking an invalid starter region.
    - If you never set your home point, the game will respawn you at your Regionsanity starting location instead of Spawning Meadows (unless, of course, your starting location happens to be in Spawning Meadows).

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- YOU THOUGHT THIS LINE WOULD BE ABOUT MODS BUT FINALLY IT ISN'T! ALL MODS ALLOWED WOOOO
- The timer on the first Regionsanity Extreme teleport out of a prohibited region may be way too short
- Fixed in v.0.12.1 hotfix:
  - Beastmaster Crystal access rule mistakenly requires owl instead of ibek.
  - Installer crashes if player doesn't already have expected files.
  - Modded shops accidentally added twice to locations.
  - Modded locations that change entity types don't remove remove the vanilla location (hi, FFP Jidamba Crystal! 👋).
  - Modded locations share IDs with Region Completion locations (boy FFP is big :) ).
- Fixed in v0.12.2 hotfix:
  - Multiple mods changing the same location crashes the game.
  - Mods adding a second type of check to the same NPC crashes the game (known to happen with FFP).
- Fixed in v0.13.0 (not compatible with v0.12.x worlds):
  - Enabling **Use Mods** creates corrupted save files (you'll know by the save slot overflowing with a bunch of random letters & symbols).
  - Interacting with a modded home point crashes the game.
  - **Regionsanity**: trying to teleport to your spawn point with Salmon Bay as your starter region teleports you to Spawning Meadows on a fish.

Regions touched in the latest rework: **Sara Sara Beach (no longer split into East and West)**, Sara Sara Bazaar, Poko Poko Desert, Ancient Reservoir, The Deep Sea, Castle Ramparts, The New World, The Sequoia, Ancient Labyrinth, **Quintar Reserve**, **Flyer's Crag**, **The Chalice of Tar**, Rolling Quintar Fields, Quintar Sanctum, Dione Shrine, Okimoto N.S., **Shoudu Province**, The Open Sea, Eastern Chasm, Tall, Tall Heights, Capital Jail, Jojo Sewers, **Jidamba Eaclaneya**, **Beaurior Volcano**, **Beaurior Rock**, **Cobblestone Crag**, Quintar Nest, Okimoto N.S., **Undercity**, Capital Pipeline, **Salmon Bay**, Salmon River, Northern Cave, **Slip Glide Ride**, **Greenshire Reprise**, Delende, Salmon Pass, Capital Sequoia
CrystalProject-v0.12.0.title: Crystal Project Version 0.12.0

CrystalProject-v0.12.1.description:
### **Crystal Project Hotfix v. 0.12.1**
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### 🚨 AP World Update 🚨

### ✅ Compatible with existing YAMLs ✅
### If Regionsanity is off, ✅ Compatible with v.0.12.0-generated worlds✅
### If Regionsanity is enabled, 🚫  Not Compatible with v.0.12.0-generated worlds 🚫

Correction to broken Beastmaster Crystal access rule.
Fixed installer crash.
Fixed modded shops accidentally getting added twice to locations.
Fixed modded locations that change entity types not removing the vanilla location (hi, FFP Jidamba Crystal! 👋).
Fixed modded locations sharing IDs with Region Completion locations (boy FFP is big :) ).

### KNOWN ISSUES
- The timer on the first Regionsanity Extreme teleport out of a prohibited region may be way too short
- Fixed in v. 0.12.2 hotfix:
  - Multiple mods changing the same location crashes the game.
  - Mods adding a second type of check to the same NPC crashes the game (known to happen with FFP).
- Fixed in v. 0.13.0 (not compatible with v. 0.12.x worlds): 
  - Enabling **Use Mods** creates corrupted save files (you'll know by the save slot overflowing with a bunch of random letters & symbols).
  - Interacting with a modded home point crashes the game.
  - **Regionsanity**: trying to teleport to your spawn point with Salmon Bay as your starter region teleports you to Spawning Meadows on a fish.
CrystalProject-v0.12.1.title: Crystal Project Hotfix Version 0.12.1

CrystalProject-v0.12.2.description:
### **Crystal Project Hotfix v. 0.12.2**
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### 🚨 AP World Update 🚨

✅ Compatible with existing YAMLs ✅

If Regionsanity is **off**, Compatible with v.0.12.0-generated worlds✅
If Regionsanity is **enabled**, Not Compatible with v.0.12.0-generated worlds 🚫

If Use Mods is **off**, Compatible with v.0.12.1-generated worlds✅
If Use Mods is **enabled**, Not Compatible with v.0.12.1-generated worlds 🚫

Fixed crash that occurred when multiple mods changed the same location.
Fixed crash that occurred if a mod added a second type of check to the same NPC.

## KNOWN ISSUES
- The timer on the first Regionsanity Extreme teleport out of a prohibited region may be way too short
- Fixed in v.0.13.0 (not compatible with existing v0.12.x worlds):
  - Enabling **Use Mods** creates corrupted save files (you'll know by the save slot overflowing with a bunch of random letters & symbols).
  - Interacting with a modded home point crashes the game.
  - **Regionsanity**: trying to teleport to your spawn point with Salmon Bay as your starter region teleports you to Spawning Meadows on a fish.
CrystalProject-v0.12.2.title: Crystal Project Hotfix Version 0.12.2

CrystalProject-v0.13.0.description:
### **Crystal Project Hotfix v. 0.13.0**
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### 🚨 AP World Update 🚨

Fixed modded saves corrupting.

Fixed crash that occurred when interacting with modded home points.
Modded home points now replace vanilla versions in the Locations list.
**Home Point Hustle**: modded home points now expected as locations and have matching teleport items instead of their vanilla versions. (Note: Modded home points are not considered to give you access to a region, since we can't know where the mods placed them.)

**Regionsanity**: trying to teleport to your spawn point with Salmon Bay as your starter region no longer teleports you to Spawning Meadows on a fish.

### KNOWN ISSUES
- The timer on the first Regionsanity Extreme teleport out of a prohibited region may be way too short
CrystalProject-v0.13.0.title: Crystal Project Hotfix Version 0.13.0

CrystalProject-v0.14.0.description:
### **Crystal Project v. 0.14.0**
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### 🚨 AP World Update 🚨

Fixed crash that occurred when playing with mods that create new regions.
Fixed generation error when a mod check required a non progression item (i.e a mod check requiring a map).
Moved shop ids to not conflict with very large mods (mods that add 10k new entities)
**Regionsanity**: Fixed an issue where region passes would not be active in the correct regions if a mod had changed the region name.

### KNOWN ISSUES
- The timer on the first Regionsanity Extreme teleport out of a prohibited region may be way too short
- Receiving a passive point cap increase does not update the available passive points until a passive is toggled on or off.
- Mods that change the text scrolls (such as the intro in spawning meadows) may result in unexpected behaviour
CrystalProject-v0.14.0.title: Crystal Project Version 0.14.0

CrystalProject-v0.15.0.description:

<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### 🚨 AP World Update 🚨

Fixed crash that occurred with home point hustle and mods enabled.
Fixed logic for checks in Jojo sewers, Castle Sequoia, and Jidamba Tangle.

### 🚨 AP Mod Update 🚨
Fixed an issue with extreme region sanity teleport triggering A.) in regular region sanity and B.) too quickly for the first teleport.
Possessor will no longer give an Ibek bell to the player if it is not part of the seeds logic.

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Receiving a passive point cap increase does not update the available passive points until a passive is toggled on or off.
- Mods that change the text scrolls (such as the intro in spawning meadows) may result in unexpected behaviour

CrystalProject-v0.5.0.description:
### **Crystal Project AP World v. 0.5 is out!** :tada: 
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

### Find a Bug? Have a Suggestion?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

### New Features
- Map Teleports: Unlock save points so you can teleport to them from the Locations list or world map! Plus a new save point at spawn so you can always teleport to it
- True Astley: New goal mode! Unlock the true ending to win!
- Keyring Mode: Tired of only getting one Cell Key? Try this mode where each dungeon has its own keyring to find with all its keys on it
- Boneless Mode: Option to remove Skeleton Key from the pool
- Hintless Shopsanity: Option to not have shops hint their items
- Raid Nans' Attic: Custom starter gear has been added! No more will your starting chemist be naked (unless you want that ^_^ )
- New Shops: Starter gear and chemist/ninja items can now be bought from some new faces at Old Nan's Watering Hole in Spawning Meadows
- Cuteness Increased: Icons added to in-game goal counter
- Team Player Award: If you get a check someone hinted for, you get a gold star on its Locations line :>
- Easier Entry: Added paste and clear buttons to the connect screen
- Special Milk: Key items that were also consumables are now their own special, non-consumable item

### Bug Fixes
- Level gating mode allows leveling past 60
- Can no longer have fewer clamshells in the pool than your goal or more clamshells than available locations
- Player-placed markers now draw on top of AP map icons
- Filled shrine shops with new items so the game doesn't crash if shopsanity is off
- Many connection, in-game tracking, and location rules bugs fixed

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- Save points may incorrectly show as accessible
- Some bosses are not included in Kill Boss mode (yet)
CrystalProject-v0.5.0.title: Crystal Project Version 0.5.0

CrystalProject-v0.6.0.description:
### **Crystal Project AP World v. 0.6 is out!** :tada: 
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

### Find a Bug? Have a Suggestion?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

### New Features
- Regionsanity: Collect Region Passes for region access! Completing one grants a bonus check and stamp of approval.
- ⚠ Mod Madness ⚠: Randomize items and locations from other Crystal Project mods! (⚠ IN BETA ⚠)
- Levels Goated: Level Passes (soft level gating) and Level Catch-Up (bestows levels & JP) options added to Level Gating!
- Obscure Routes: Know the map like the back of your hand.
- Explorer Mode: Option preset to minimize combat and maximize exploration - grab the Crystal.Project-Explorer.yaml below!
- Progressive Mounts: Gain mounts in vanilla order. No more Spawning Meadows owl!
- On the Go: Mounts and teleport stones now auto-added to Quick Use!
- Items? Grouped: Mounts, teleport stones, and more grouped for convenient hinting.

### Improvements
- Summon fights and more added to Kill Bosses mode
- Recommended Finish Line for Astley now Advanced
- Saner Shopsanity prices (ha)
- Growth Change NPC now free
- Archipelago forced to be the 1st mod loaded
- Luxury Bouncer behaves more sensibly (and talkatively)
- Many location names improved
- Error messages improved to reduce head scratching

### Bug Fixes
- Starting Job growths no longer broken!
- Save points should now correctly display their accessibility
- Clamshells goal capped at 99. No triple digit clams.
- Many connection, in-game tracking, and location rules bugs fixed

### Backend Improvements
- So, so many unit tests written...

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- Shoudu Province and Land's End rules don't take teleport stones into account
- Jidamba Tangle/Eaclaneya and Undercity location rules are too restrictive
- Mods that remove locations not supported
CrystalProject-v0.6.0.title: Crystal Project Version 0.6.0

CrystalProject-v0.6.1.description:
### **Crystal Project AP World v. 0.6.1 is out!** :tada: 
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

### Find a Bug? Have a Suggestion?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

### Bug Fixes
- Level Gating: Level Capped option is no longer both haunted and cursed! (will no longer crash the game)
- Mod Madness/Use Mods:
  - Isunselectablejob key error no longer a problem when using older Crystal Project mods
  - Fixed issue where modded item was not marked as progression under certain circumstances
  - Duplicate location names/ids in mods no longer causing generation failures

### Thanks for linking Eijebong's AP Fuzzer, palex00 ! :tada:
We found and fixed these because of it:
- Regionsanity: Decreased generation failure chance
- Level Gating now adjusts the number of Progressive Levels in the pool and the player's Max Level if the item pool is too full
- Eliminated low% chance of generation failure because we used the wrong can_reach parameter

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- Mods newer than Crystal Edit version 31 are not compatible
- Shoudu Province and Land's End rules don't take teleport stones into account
- Jidamba Tangle/Eaclaneya and Undercity location rules are too restrictive
- Mod Madness/Use Mods setting:
  - Mods that remove locations not supported (Kill Bosses mode + FFP mod has at least one dead check; we've got an idea how to fix this (thanks to FFP's dev!) but it's not in yet)
  - Cannot currently tell in what order mods other than Archipelago will be loaded; workaround: rename mod jsons in crystal_project_mods folder to be alphabetical in the intended load order
  - If multiple mods use the same ID for different modded Treasures/NPCs, only the first mod's entity will be considered; randomizing more than one mod at a time is not currently recommended
  - Octopath Secret Class mod causes generation failure
- Regionsanity: the intro narration will not play until you get the Spawning Meadows Pass (we think) and then it will kidnap you to the start of the game :) enjoy a break with Nan!
- Luxury Key Thief is missing a rule requiring the Luxury Pass
CrystalProject-v0.6.1.title: Crystal Project Version 0.6.1

CrystalProject-v0.7.0.description:
### **Crystal Project AP World v. 0.7 is out!** :tada: 
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

### Find a Bug? Have a Suggestion?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

### New Features
- Connect the Dots Regionsanity: Regions with collected Passes but missing a Region Pass path to the starting region are now displayed in yellow in the Regions menu instead of red
- Tidier Cartography: Ignore a location in the Locations menu to clear it from your map
- Even Faster Teleporting: Locations menu keybind added (and we discovered a world map keybind already existed! Thanks, @corence!)
- Challenge or Cake Walk: Level Compared to Enemies option added to Level Gating! Choose to be a few levels above or below enemies when you're expected to fight them
- Who Needs Levels: max level cap can now be lowered below default (for all you level 3 powerhouses out there)
- Deadly Boss Mods: Use Mods now randomizes modded bosses in Kill Bosses Mode

### Improvements
- Connecting to a multiworld moved to new game creation, instead of after loading in
- Only new hint messages appear on load instead of all of them
- Added YAML-less support for Universal Tracker
- Use Mods now supports NPCs unlocking jobs
- No more world map crashes!! Hopefully!!!

### Bug Fixes
- Regionsanity:
  - Ferry no longer strands you in the ocean!
  - Intro narration no longer kidnaps you to Spawning Meadows!
- Use Mods:
  - Sepulchra in FFP mod is fixed; thanks to FFP's dev for ideas on how to fix! (other similar locations should be fixed as well)
  - Multiple mods affecting the same ID no longer break locations
- Many connection and location rules bugs fixed

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- Mods newer than Editor version 30 are incompatible
- Use Mods option not recommended to use with Regionsanity
CrystalProject-v0.7.0.title: Crystal Project Version 0.7.0

CrystalProject-v0.8.0.description:
### **Crystal Project AP World v. 0.8 is out!** :tada: 
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases>

### Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

### Find a Bug? Have a Suggestion?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

### New Features
- Background Learning + LP Recycling Program:
  - Have the game auto-spend LP and auto-equip passives for you when you level! (passives that are only situationally useful don't auto-equip)
  - No longer throw LP directly on the floor! After mastering a job, excess LP will be funneled to subjob and then other unlocked jobs.
- Item Info Begone: Hide whether locations are progression from yourself! Add mystery to your life.
- Enhanced Regions: "View Regions" hotkey in the world map now displays a list of AP regions! Pick a region to open its Location list from there.

### Improvements
- Level Gating: Regions menu displays expected level per region
- Regions with no expected locations in them now say they're empty instead of complete

### Bug Fixes
- Regionsanity + Shopsanity: Player now always has a way to earn money before shop locations are required to progress
- Use Mods:
  - Killing a modded spark boss correctly gives a check
  - Checks if job/mastery is required for a modded location
  - Mods that apply starting passives now supported
  - Having mods in the AP folder no longer breaks starting jobs if Use Mods is off
  - Starting jobs set correctly with slow-loading mods
  - Mods with move player command that spawns a new NPC based on proximity should now work
- Redid Undercity location rules to be more flexible
- Updated Land's End location rules for entering via Callisto Stone
- Shouduuuu _shakes fist_
- Handles lack of room for clamshells or progressive levels in the pool more gracefully

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- Mods newer than Editor version 30 are incompatible
CrystalProject-v0.8.0.title: Crystal Project Version 0.8.0

CrystalProject-v0.9.0.description:
### **Crystal Project AP World v. 0.9 is out!** 🎉

https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/releases
### Setup Guide

https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md
### Find a Bug? Have a Suggestion?

- Check if it's in here: https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

### New Features

- Traps: New option in the YAML, trapLikelihood. This is the percentage chance that a trap replaces a filler item, a value of 0 means there will be no traps in your seed.
  - Traps will mess with the player in such ways as showing dialog blocks, teleporting the player, and spawning boss sparks.
- AutoJump Toggle Keybind: Tired of jumping at weird times when you didn't want to but you still like AutoJump?  Well that will still happen sometimes because you'll forget if it's currently on or off but at least you can now keybind AutoJump and toggle it easily.
- New LevelGating Option: Choose LevelGating = Set to make it combine the effects of Cap and Catchup meaning you can never earn exp and only gain levels from items.  Who needs grinding?

### Improvements

- Messages will now show even if auto saving or music track information is on screen.  The new zone name will still hide messages for a while so be patient.  You'll see the message for that check go through soon!
- The healing homepoint setting can now be turned off after it's been turned on.  This is for all the Sadist Sam enjoyers out there!
- Poko Poko checks may now only require rental quintar instead of an actual quintar =)  I know you all love low mount Poko Poko!!!

### Bug Fixes

- JP will only be sent to other jobs if Auto Spend JP is on now
- Shoudu Chloe should work again
- Fixed crash in Universal Tracker version 0.2.12 and above where the tracker doesn't mimic Archipelago logic precisely and managed to find some busted code in our apworld.
- Logic fixes for having Europa Stone in Jidamba.
- Logic fixes for Sara Sara Beach West.
- Improved Boomer society region connections.
- Mercury Shrine region completion should no longer show up in non-regionsanity games, oops!

### KNOWN ISSUES

- Only works on the Steam version
- Mods newer than Editor version 30 are incompatible
CrystalProject-v0.9.0.title: Crystal Project Version 0.9.0

v0.1.description:
### Features
**2 goal modes**
- Astley: Collect the number of Jobs specified in your yaml and then receive a New World Stone to go defeat Astley.
- Clamshells: Collect the number of Clamshells specified in your yaml and then go talk to the Manana Man in Seaside Cliffs.

**Built-in Tracking**
- The World Map and minimap will show nearby crystals, treasures, and NPCs that count as checks.
- Additionally, the menu contains a Locations button which will display all regions of the game and the locations inside each region.
- The tracking uses unique icons for filler (brown chest), useful (red chest), and progression (purple chest) items.  It also shows a red X for checks that are currently out of logic, as well as unique icons for different hint priorities.  These show up on the maps and the Locations menu.

**Key Modes**
 - Skeleton Key: Only the Skeleton Key will be available in your seed. You are the Master of Unlocking.
 - Vanilla: All vanilla keys will be available in the seed, including the Skeleton Key.

**Flexible Regions**
Customize which parts of the game will have checks available (note: only included regions will show tracked checks):
 - Beginner: Only regions up through the end of Skumparadise will have checks.
 - Advanced: Regions up to Salmon Bay will have checks.
 - Expert: Regions up to the Deep Sea will have checks (note: The Depths will not be included).
 - All: Every region is included.

**Job Randomization**
- Add jobs to the pool of items you can receive.
- Starting Job randomization will change your starting jobs if enabled.  This will only take effect after you connect to Archipelago, so don't get attached to the jobs you pick for your characters on the new game screen if you select this option! ^_^

### Setup Guide
https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md

### Find a bug?
https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues

### Want to chat about the mod?
Check the Crystal Project thread inside the future-game-design channel of the Archipelago Discord!

### KNOWN ISSUES

- Only works on the Steam version of the game at this time!  The installer compares our modded version of the game to the release version and updates it.  Non-steam versions are not 100% identical to the Steam version so at the moment our installer will fail on it.
- True Astley mode not implemented.
- Keyring mode not implemented.
- Turning off JobRando will cause the in-game tracking to be confused sometimes.
- Some missable locations are not included as checks (yet)!
v0.1.title: Crystal Project Initial Release Version 0.1

v0.2.description:
### New Installation Instructions
- The Crystal Project dev has made a beta branch to keep Archipelago compatibility bc he's super rad! In your Steam library, go to Crystal Project's properties and under Beta Participation, join the archipelago version 1.6.5!

### New Features
- Goal Tracker added to menu summary screen! Easily check to see how many Clamshells/Jobs you still need.
- Kill Bosses Mode: Adds boss murder as check locations. (on by default)
- Progressive Equipment Mode: Makes each category of weapon and armor drop in progressive order from weakest to strongest. (on by default)
- Easy Leveling Mode: Experience gain is no longer reduced by death or being a higher level than an enemy.
- Music Rando: Randomize your tunes!
- Rearranged YAML options to be sorted by type (fancy option grouping planned but not yet!)

### Bug Fixes
- Saving a game before connecting to Archipelago no longer breaks Starting Job Rando (among other things ^_^;;)
- Fixed several things about saving lol
- Fixed incorrect rules for a couple locations in Capital Sequoia and Lake Delende
- Added Quintar as possibility for Capital Sequoia -> Cobblestone Crag

### Setup Guide
https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md

### Find a bug?
https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version of the game at this time! The installer compares our modded version of the game to the release version and updates it. Non-steam versions are not 100% identical to the Steam version so at the moment our installer will fail on it.
- True Astley mode not implemented.
- Keyring mode not implemented.
- Turning off JobRando will cause the in-game tracking to be confused sometimes.
- Turning off JobRando with Starting Job Rando on will have strange results. (JobRando will be prerequisite in future)
- Some missable locations are not included as checks (yet)!
- Turning on mods that add Crystals results in the added Crystals acting like Home Point Stones only, you receive nothing from them.
v0.2.title: Crystal Project Version 0.2

v0.3.description:
### Crystal Project AP World v. 0.3 is out! :tada:

### Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

### Find a Bug?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

### Setup Improvements
- Updated installer to be rerunnable and have more useful error messages
- Added .Net 8.0 requirement to the guide
- Added a note that you can use the keyboard on the connect screen

### New Feature
- Level Gating Option: Your party's starting max level cap is set to 10 and can no longer be changed. Find Progressive Max Level Cap Increases (+10 each) to progress. If your party's max level cap is below the area or boss level, those checks are considered out of logic.

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed rules for Reaper Crystal, 5 treasure chests, 2 bosses, and a rooftop Lost Penguin
- Added swimming rule for The Deep Sea ^_^;
- Fixed ID on Chemist Crystal
- Fixed an unobtainable Overpass chest
- Crystals added by mods should now act normally
- Fixed several on-disconnect bugs

### Backend Improvements
- Archipelago Unittests work on both the full APWorld and just for our world (thanks Ixrec!)
- Disabled opening narration on debug builds (sorry Intro Nan)

### In the Works
- Shopsanity
- Improved Teleport Stone logic

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- True Astley goal not implemented
- Keyring mode not implemented
- Checks obtained in regions considered inaccessible confuses in-game tracking
- Luxury Store guard and Quintar stable owners confuse in-game tracking
- Turning off JobRando confuses in-game tracking
- Turning off JobRando and Starting Job Rando on will delete some Jobs
- Some missable locations are not included as checks (yet)
- Some bosses are not included in Kill Boss mode (yet)
- Owl Drum location might not appear if you already have it
- Disconnecting and completing a check doesn't send or save it
v0.3.title: Crystal Project Version 0.3

v0.4.1.description:
### Crystal Project AP World v. 0.4.1 is out! :tada:

### Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

### Find a Bug or Have a Feature Request?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

### Bug Fixes
- Shop locations were accidentally made part of the boss locations list, and thus only counted as checks if you had Kill Bosses Mode turned on.  So if you turned Shopsanity and Kill Bosses Mode both on or both off it was fine, and otherwise it was not.  This v0.4.1 update is entirely to fix this bug.  The only thing changed is a new .apworld.  The v0.4 yaml and Installer are unchanged.

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- Checks obtained in regions considered inaccessible confuses in-game tracking
- Some bosses are not included in Kill Boss mode (yet)
v0.4.1.title: Crystal Project Version 0.4.1

v0.4r2.description:
### Crystal Project AP World v. 0.4 is out! :tada:

### Setup Guide
<https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/blob/main/worlds/crystal_project/docs/setup_en.md>

### Find a Bug or Have a Feature Request?
- Check if it's in here: <https://github.com/Emerassi/CrystalProjectAPWorld/issues>
- If not, please add it! :> Thanks!

### Setup Improvements
- Added instructions for switching versions of Crystal Project and Crystal Project AP

### New Features
- Shopsanity! all shop inventories can now be randomized into the item pool. Be prepared, adventurers...
- Make it Work: Starting Job Rando now allows you to start with fewer jobs than normal. Live your dreams of trying to adventure with an all-chemist party!
- Advanced Cartography: shiny new map icons will now display hint status, accessibility, and arrows for whether the location is vertically above or below you
- New Friends: added many formerly-missable NPCs as check locations, such as various Reids and Chloes
- Multiworld Mismatch Message: a warning appears if you try to connect an existing save to the wrong room
- Title Screen Update: version number now displayed on title screen (along with some other subtle changes)

### Bug Fixes
- Shrine shops no longer sell teleport items
- Fixed a bunch of progressive item, Starting Job Rando, and connection bugs
- Updated many location access requirements, like the Ibek Cave and Okimoto N.S. (Shoudu Province is still WIP)
- Stopped Owl Drum, Pyramid Key Giver, and Worried Mom from disappearing if you have the item you get from them in the base game
- Crystals added by mods should now act normally, round 2!
- Moving around while a message is on screen no longer makes menu noises

### KNOWN ISSUES
- Only works on the Steam version
- Checks obtained in regions considered inaccessible confuses in-game tracking
- Some bosses are not included in Kill Boss mode (yet)
- All the shop locations are enabled/disabled based on Kill Bosses mode.  So you should either enable kill bosses AND shopsanity, or disable them both.
v0.4r2.title: Crystal Project Version 0.4
